sprites

Class Teleport

  • java.lang.Object
    • sprites.InteractiveTileObject
      • sprites.Teleport

  • public class Teleport
extends InteractiveTileObject
    Teleport that can be used in the map to teleport Auber to different rooms.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class sprites.InteractiveTileObject

        body, bounds, fixture, map, tile, world

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new instantiated Teleport object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Teleport

        public Teleport(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                com.badlogic.gdx.maps.tiled.TiledMap map,
                com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle bounds,
                java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new instantiated Teleport object.
        Parameters:
        world - Physics world the teleport should query
        map - Tiled map teleport will be placed in
        bounds - The bounds of where the teleport will sense Auber
        name - the room name of the teleport
